#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
	{
	int flag,test,i,rem;
	long long int n;
	cin>>test;
	for(i = 1;i <= test;i++)
	{
		flag = 0;
		cin>>n;
		while(n != 1)
		{
			rem = n%2;
			n = n/2;
			if(rem == 1)
			{
				flag = 1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag == 0){
			cout<<"BKUL"<<endl;
		}
		else{
			cout<<"BMEENA"<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
